title: Jose Miguel Rodriguez Espinosa (born November 1, 1953), Spanish astrophysicist, researcher | World Biographical Encyclopedia
snippet: Married Maria Luisa Carmona Urda, August 15, 1977. Children: Marisa Rodriguez Carmona, Pilar Rodriguez Carmona.

title: José Miguel Rodríguez Espinosa - Wikipedia
snippet: José Miguel Rodríguez Espinosa is the current General Secretary of The International Astronomical Union (IAU). Espinosa is a Spanish astronomer working in particular in the field of active galaxies, star formation and the high redshift universe as well as in instrumentation.
